name: HyperTexasPachinkoPongSurvarium with Cows (LDJAM41)
description:
This game gives you a possibility to :
- Beat the shit out of your competitors
- Earn some money
- Hear lots of pachinko sounds
- Hear lots of Muuuu
- Play PONG
- Ride the cow
- Build your dream
- Rate it ( :

Even Chuck Norris can't beat this game the first try.
